mapper.select: delete from(select * from payment order by rownum desc) where rownum = 1 and m_no = #{m_no} no = #{no}
select no from(select * from payment order by rownum desc) where rownum = 1 and m_no = #{m_no}

select
d.startdate, d.enddate, h.name as h_name, h.category as h_category, h.hp as h_hp, p.price as p_price, p.paydate as p_paydate, p.type as p_type from payment p, room r, hotel h, roomdate d where p.p_no = r.id and r.id = d.room_id and r.h_id = h.no
e.receiptday, e.returnday, r.name as r_name, r.company as r_company, r.type as r_type, p.price as p_price, p.paydate as p_paydate, p.type as p_type from payment p, rentcar_res e, rentcar r where p.p_no = e.res_id and e.r_id = r.id
and p.m_no=#{m_no} and p.type=#{type} and p.no=#{no}

select
d.startdate, d.enddate, h.name as h_name, h.category as h_category, h.hp as h_hp, m.name as m_name, m.email as m_email, m.id as m_id, p.price as p_price, p.paydate as p_paydate from from member m, payment p, room r, hotel h, roomdate d where m.memberNum = p.m_no and p.p_no = r.id and r.id = d.room_id and r.h_id = h.no
e.receiptday, e.returnday,r.name as r_name, r.type as r_type, r.company as r_company, m.name as m_name, m.email as m_email, m.id as m_id, p.price as p_price, p.paydate as p_paydate from member m, payment p, rentcar_res e, rentcar r where m.memberNum = p.m_no and p.p_no = e.res_id and e.r_id = r.id
and p.m_no = #{m_no} and p.type = #{type} and p.no = #{no}
select * from payment where valid = 1 order by no desc
